comment: Probably one of the worst graduate school professors I have ever taken in the cyber master program at KSU. Terrible grader. Completely tanked my gpa. Offers no support and his grading has no clear criteria nor helpful feedback. Professors like this should just go into research and stay away from teaching.

Professor Yan Huang is not too bad. The language barrier can be extremely tough at times when explaining situations to him. His English is not very good at all. I do believe that there will be many bad reviews to come from this semester because a majority of students in the class this semester came from criminal justice backgrounds with no tech exp
One of the worst graders I have seen at ksu. Does not want students to succeed and places unclear assignments on d2l with terrible grading criteria. If you care about your grade average run far away!
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework
